0111100110101010 1010110100101011 0 -> sum: 0010011011010101, cout: 1

0101100011110010 0111000110111011 0 -> sum: 1100101010101101, cout: 0
0101010000101001 1101101110100110 1 -> sum: 0010111111010000, cout: 1
1111000000010100 0100100000001101 0 -> sum: 0011100000100001, cout: 1
1110101101111010 0011101011101101 0 -> sum: 0010011001100111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
